about.greetingText: I am Jonas and I created this website as a kind of digital business card. The chess board is just a bit of interactive fun. The chess pieces' positions are stored in the URL, so you can make a move and send the link to a friend. ðŸ¤—
about.expText: I have professional experience in TypeScript, React and many accompanying front-end development technologies. During my studies in computer science, I learned popular programming language such as Java and Python. But I also got to shift my perspective learning more niche technologies like Haskell.

settings.gameText: The chess pieces' positions are stored in the URL. Therefore you can share your board with a friend and they see exactly what you see.
settings.namesText: If you like you can enter your and your friends name and they will be displayed next to the board.
settings.queensText: Your game has been going on for a while? You can always add more queens at random.
